Proposal for Jenifer Franco

Hi Jenifer, this is Patrick from Play Hardscapes. Thank you for the opportunity to provide a proposal for your court resurfacing project in Roanoke. Per our discussion, you're looking to have the work completed in May. I've outlined the key project details and pricing below.

Project Scope

The project will include resurfacing your existing 7,200 square foot asphalt court located over the hill and through the woods from your home. The scope of work includes:

  • Pressure washing the existing asphalt surface
  • Conducting patchwork repairs, estimated to require 10 gallons of patch material
  • Applying a new acrylic surface system in two colors - a red apron and blue court
  • Laying out and painting lines for one regulation tennis court

Pricing

Based on the project requirements, I estimate the total cost will be $13,500. This includes all materials, equipment, labor, and travel expenses for our 5-person crew to complete the work over an estimated 5 days, plus 2 travel days. I'll provide a detailed cost breakdown in a formal estimate upon your approval to proceed.

Next Steps

To move forward with the project, I'll need you to:

  1. Approve this proposal
  2. Sign our services agreement
  3. Provide a 50% deposit to secure your spot on our May schedule

Once those items are complete, I'll have our Site Manager conduct a detailed site survey and provide you with a formal estimate and project schedule. The remaining balance will be due upon substantial completion of the work.

Please let me know if you have any questions about the proposal or if there is anything else I can assist with. I look forward to working with you to restore your court to top playing condition!

Best Regards,
Patrick
Play Hardscapes
